name: Kamige A Very Good Visual Novel
name_original: Kamige A Very Good Visual Novel
description:
For Android devices and windows!

You are a down on your luck highschooler summoned to another world plagued by child slavery. It is your job to free all the loli's through force or other more socialy acceptable means. Will you take on this peerless task and become the master to ....

Just kidding! It's all a dream. Enjoy unique visuals and an even more unique story line involving 4chan, the DMV, Wallwart, and other exciting locations! 

Garenteed to make you a better person!

Will cure your lonesomeness in these trying times. 

Stunning 4k HD pixel art!

Thought's and prayers!
